pkgmetadata.longdescription: Results Tables to Bridge the Rift Between Epidemiologists and Their Data // Presentation-ready results tables for epidemiologists in an automated, reproducible fashion. The user provides the final analytical dataset and specifies the design of the table, with rows and/or columns defined by exposure(s), effect modifier(s), and estimands as desired, allowing to show descriptors and inferential estimates in one table -- bridging the rift between epidemiologists and their data, one table at a time. See Rothman (2017) doi:10.1007/s10654-017-0314-3.
